scenes.summary: A golden retriever and a white cat walk together through tall grass at sunset
scenes.audio_summary: Soft ambient music, dog starts speaking
scenes.dialogue: Dog: 'Look how far we've come!'  Cat: 'And yet the tree still looks so far.'

scenes.summary: The cat jumps onto a rock as the camera pans right
scenes.dialogue: Cat: 'I can see the river from here!'
